quoteText:
If you violate these Terms, we may stop providing Services to you or we may close your Microsoft account.
We may also block delivery of a communication (like email, file sharing or instant message) to or from the Services in an effort to enforce these Terms or we may remove or refuse to publish Your Content for any reason.
title: Skype can cancel your account if you are in violation of its terms

tosdr.case: The service can suspend your account for several reasons
tosdr.tldr: Skype can cancel your account if you are in violation of its terms.
